detaileddescription.para: Constructs a Room with a specified ID and a reference to the game description. This constructor initializes a room without a name or a static description.

parameterdescription.para: The unique identifier for the room.
The game description, providing access to global game state.

memberdef.argsstring: (int id, String name, String description, GameDescription game)
memberdef.name: Room

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a Room with a specified ID, name, description, and a reference to the game description.

parameterdescription.para: The unique identifier for the room.
The static description of the room.
The game description, providing access to global game state.

detaileddescription.para: Adds an object to the room. If the object's ID is not 6, it is added to the room's object list and the global game object list.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add to the room.

detaileddescription.para: Generates a dynamic description of the room, including details about objects and their states. For example, if a reinforced door object (ID 9) is open, this is reflected in the description.

simplesect.para: A string representing the dynamic look of the room.

detaileddescription.para: Represents a room within the adventure game. A room can have various properties such as a name, description, visibility, connections to other rooms (north, south, east, west), and objects within it. Rooms can also contain a monster, and have dynamic descriptions based on game state.
